text: viśvāsavantayingen vū samūhayan dekak taman tuḷa āravul æti kara gatahot (samūhayan) deka atarē samādāna kara harinu. pasuva ovungen ek (samūhayak) anit (samūhaya) kerehi (sīmāva ikmavā) aparādha kaḷahot, aparādha kaḷa aya, allāhgē niyōgayan desaṭa pæmiṇena turu ovun samaga oba (viruddhava) yuddha karanu. ovun (allāhgē niyōgayan desaṭa) hæruṇahot sādhāraṇa andamaṭa ema (samūhayan) deka atarē samādāna kara harinu. (mehi) oba sādhāraṇa andamaṭa kaṭayutu karanu. niyata vaśayenma allāh viniścayakaruvanva priya karannēya
